name: The Pit (New)
description:
The goal is clear.
you woke up deep underground. Everything is damp and wet. From a deep cave, you embark on a journey full of pitfalls and enemies. Full of fear and apprehension, you reach the source of evil. Your goal is clear. Defeat the evil.

THE LEVELS
Go through a lot of levels full of challenges. The levels are divided into chapters. Each chapter has a specific soundtrack and atmosphere

Main story:
  • Chapter 1 - The cave
  • Chapter 2 - Landscape
  • Chapter 3 - The old temple
  • Chapter 4 - Evil's dimension

Extras:
  • Enemy shooter
  • Jump king
  • Easy levels
  • Longmania
  • Gravity-man
  • Reverse realm
  • Bounce city
  • Time race

FEATURES

  • magical shooting hand
  • Teleports
  • Gravity changers
  • Dark mass
  • Bunch of enemies
  • Shooting walls
  • Bouncy mushrooms
  • Spikes
  • Dangerous water
  • Ladders
  • Coins
  • Life coins
